def_cn: (某些植物、树木上的)刺，棘刺
def_en: Thorns are the sharp points on some plants and trees, for example on a rose bush.

def_cn: 荆棘;带刺的树;带刺小灌木
def_en: A thorn or a thorn bush or a thorn tree is a bush or tree which has a lot of thorns on it.

def_cn: 肉中刺;长期困扰的问题
def_en: If you describe someone or something as a thorn in your side or a thorn in your flesh, you mean that they are a continuous problem to you or annoy you.
